author: daxian-dbw
body:
## Steps to reproduce
1. Replace the inbox AssemblyLoadContext.dll with the one from PowerShell Core in NanoServer.
2. Run `powershell` on the local NanoServer VM
## Expected behavior

It should start a local interactive powershell session
## Actual behavior

Fail to start
## Root Cause

It's hard coded for native hosts in NanoServer to load AssemblyLoadContext 3.0.0.0, but the one from PowerShell Core from GitHub repo is 1.0.0.0
title: Assembly version of AssemblyLoadContext should be 3.0.0.0 so that it doesn't break the existing native hosts in NanoServer
